title: Seven Knights Revolution: Eiyuu no Keishousha
synopsis: Seven Knights Revolution: Eiyuu no Keishousha is set in a world where eons ago valiant heroes fought against the forces of "Destruction." While their deeds passed into legend, the power of these heroes was later inherited by "successors" who fought to protect the world. One day, Faria, a successor of the Seven Knights, saves an ordinary boy named Nemo from the forces of Destruction.
voices: ['Yamamura, Hibiku', 'Yamashita, Daiki', 'Numakura, Manami', 'Sakurai, Takahiro', 'Arai, Satomi', 'Umehara, Yuuichirou', 'Shimamura, Yuu', 'Hozumi, Yuya', 'Morikawa, Toshiyuki', 'Matsumoto, Rica']
staff: [['Satomi, Tetsurou', ['Producer']], ['Ichikawa, Kazuya', ['Director']], ['Haraguchi, Noboru', ['Sound Director']], ['Yamashita, Daiki', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
